data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shachar, Einat, Melika, George, Inbar, Moshe, Dorchin, Netta (2018): The oak gall wasps of Israel (Hymenoptera, Cynipidae, Cynipini) - diversity, distribution and life history. Zootaxa 4521 (4): 451-498, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4521.4.1
